name: Sarah Jenkins
comment: Liam and the team were fantastic. Our slab was a mess after removing the tiles, but they got it perfectly flat for our new hybrid flooring. Highly recommended!

name: Mike Stevens
comment: Professional, on time, and dust-free as promised. Turned a nightmare glue removal job into a quick fix.

name: Amanda Clarke
comment: Great to find a team willing to travel up the range. They understood the red soil movement issues and prepped our heritage home accordingly.

name: David Ross
comment: Good effective work. Removed all the old carpet glue. Left the site clean.
